Data.Name: player
Data.Title: Player Population
Data.Tooltip: Locked population cap for all players.

Data.Name: team
Data.Title: Team Population
Data.Tooltip: Distributes a team's total population cap evenly over all its living members. Enables the setting “Locked teams.”

Data.Name: world
Data.Title: World Population
Data.Tooltip: Distributes the total population cap evenly over all living players.
